testcase.classname: Form Authentication (verify successful login by valid credential)
testcase.name: Form Authentication with valid login details
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the-internet.herokuapp.com.................................passed When user clicks on Form Authentication tab.................................passed And user provides valid username and password on login page.................passed Then user should be able to securely login to their account.................passed

testcase.classname: Form Authentication (verify successful login by valid credential)
testcase.name: Form Authentication with invalid login details
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the-internet.herokuapp.com.................................passed When user clicks on Form Authentication tab.................................passed And user types invalid "tomsmith123" and "12345" on login page..............passed Then user should be able to see error message...............................passed

testcase.classname: Click the alert buttons and check the relevant message appears
